description:
This race is significantly smaller than the average Medium-sized creature. Small creatures are typically about the size of a cat or smaller.
When a Small creature attacks a Medium creature, the damage rolled on the weapon table is halved (rounded down), and then armour applied as usual. If a Medium creature attacks a Small creature, damage is rolled as normal and then doubled. Again, armour is applied as normal before remaining points are deducted from STAMINA.
If a Small creature attacks a Huge creature, the damage is divided by four (rounded down). A Huge creature attacking a Small creature will quadruple the damage applied.
name: Small
